author: jvanzyl
msg: - changes to the default properties to match the cleanup

author: jvanzyl
msg: - cleanup of the Runtime configuration keys.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - removed the setProperties() as it is no longer required.
- made setDefaultProperties() private as client applications don't
need to deal with this the Runtime will handle it and the Velocity
application class will provide everything client applications need.
- cleaned up the init(Properties) and init(String) and delegated
the work off to the Configuration class.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - conversion method to turn a Properties object into a Configuration object
- add ability to setProperty to take a CSV list and deal with it
correctly. if a CSV list is received as a property to be set
then it will be parsed and vectorized. this is to help with
the fact that Properties cannot deal with multi same valued
keys and the reality that people still use them :-)

author: jon
msg: fixed naming pattern. thanks to gumpy for finding it!
